Title: Requires applicants for the renewal of a driver's license to prove they have acceptable vision to operate a motor vehicle
Summary: Requires applicants for the renewal of a driver's license to prove they have acceptable vision to operate a motor vehicle.
LawCode: Amd ยง502, V & T L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the vehicle and traffic law, in relation to requiring applicants for the renewal of a driver's license to complete a vision test
